channel.title: postgresql on Gustavo Caso
channel.description: Recent content in postgresql on Gustavo Caso

item.title: Exporting and Import Heroku DB
item.description: Recently I was playing around with my local database in my rails project, eventually I screw up, I had to delete all the data. I use rake db:resetand rake db:create but how I was going to get all the data again, manually ?

item.title: Rails Postgresql Error ORDER clause
item.description: Postgresql ORDER clause or be used in a aggregate function While working in a rails project recently, I step on an error that say: PG::Error: ERROR: column "number" must appear in the GROUP BY clause or be used in an aggregate function, I didn’t have any idea how to solve it.
